Regulation (EU) 2021/2139(8).’
Appendix D of Annex II to Commission Delegated Reg (EU) 2021/2139 states: ‘… For
sites/operations located in or near biodiversity-sensitive areas (including the Natura 2000
network of protected areas, UNESCO World Heritage sites and Key Biodiversity Areas, as well as
